name: guideline
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: information intended to advise people on how something should be done or what something should be
trans_examp.trans_cn: 指导方针，指导原则，准则

example.eg: The EU has issued guidelines on appropriate levels of pay for part-time manual workers.
example.egtrans: 欧盟已经颁布了有关兼职体力劳动者适宜的酬劳标准。
